'''Beta 1.2.13.12''' is the sixth and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.13]], released on March 23, 2018, which makes one change.<ref>{{tweet|MattGartzke|977004097114009600}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Changed the back-end of the game to help the developers collecting crash reports that required a client-side fix.</onlyinclude>
